body_html: Hmmm I'm not sure if we want this to be the default meaning of a sparse tensor. In my view they should really be a drop in replacement for dense semantics, except that we would be optimizing most entries out for space reasons. On the other hand, allocating large dense tensors as their gradients might OOM too...

body: Hmmm I'm not sure if we want this to be the default meaning of a sparse tensor. In my view they should really be a drop in replacement for dense semantics, except that we would be optimizing most entries out for space reasons. On the other hand, allocating large dense tensors as their gradients might OOM too...
